name: Emigrant Capital
description: Emigrant Capital is the private investment division of Emigrant Bank, the nation’s largest family-owned and operated bank. They invest directly from the bank's balance sheet, bringing broad financial capabilities, operational expertise, and longstanding industry relationships. They typically invest between $5 million and $30 million in businesses generating between $2 million and $15 million in EBITDA through majority recap, minority growth capital, and debt/equity solutions. Their investment focus centers on industrial technology, business services, and consumer lifestyle industries.
